prereq.p:
To create a Private Network, you must have a user account with one of the following roles:
Network_Explorer_Administrator
Network_Explorer_Operator
Note: To check the currently assigned roles, select the User ID on the top right hand corner, and click View User Profile from the drop-down list. The assigned roles are displayed.
If you do not have the required roles, contact the System Administrator.

context.p: This tutorial describes the steps required to create a Private Network. A Private Network is a grouping of Network Elements that can be associated together for a particular purpose, For example by company, project or location.

ul.li: Select a Custom Topology from the Topology drop down.

Select Required Collection.
Note: If no collections exist, select the root of Custom Topology.
Click Create a Private Network. The Create a Private Network fly-out panel is displayed.
Enter required information in the fly-out panel. For more information, see Create a Private Network Fly-out.
Click Create. The collection is added to the Custom Topology tree and automatically selected.
